channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3432] XBOX Forums: Why your son was suspended until 31/12/9999
[+2607] That probably could've been worded better (PIC)
item.description: Not sure that headline's gonna help your P.R., Your Holiness.

item.title: [+1607] How to Build a Pencil Crossbow in 7 Steps
item.description: Ever want a crossbow but don’t want to go out and actually spend hundreds on a dangerous weapon? Now you can make one with everyday household items using these simple steps!

item.title: [+1483] Early News Report About This Thing Called "Internet"
item.description: Back when this was all just getting started...

item.title: [+1357] Octobus Steals Camera and Filmmaker Chases it Down
item.description: An underwater photographer was peacefully cruising along a reef when this speedy octopus snaked out an arm and grabbed his Lumix away. The cephalopod then proceeded to jet away at top speed, while filming the whole thing -- unfortunately, with more than a couple of its thumbs covering the lens.

item.title: [+1237] Dad Must Be Proud (PIC)
item.description: We've heard of these men who dress up like unicorns and figured they probably wouldn't go into porn. Then this guy comes along...

item.title: [+1203] George Washington's $300,000 library book fine
item.description: A New York library discovers two unreturned books checked out by George Washington that have accrued some $300,000 in fines for being 220 years late.

item.title: [+940] The Great American Pot Smoke-Out (PICS)
item.description: Advocates for the legalization of marijuana (as well as a few recreational tokers) will mark the movement's progress on April 20, a.k.a. 4/20, the drug's unofficial national holiday.

item.title: [+916] The United States of Apple (pic)
item.description: In a report issued Friday, Experian Simmons surveyed 206 so-called DMAs (designated market areas, or what we used to call "cities") and identified those that have the highest concentration of Apple (AAPL) users.

item.title: [+815] That's One Way To Punch A Zombie (pic)
[+799] Inequal Pay Hurts America
item.description: Why should workers push themselves to high standards for, say, $15 to $25 dollars per hour while watching their companies' CEOs and other senior managers compensate themselves at as much as $5,000 in that same hour?

item.title: [+775] RIAA Wants Gov. to Delete Your Illegal Downloads
item.description: Copyright holders are now lobbying to be allowed access to your computer to delete content they deem bad.

item.title: [+710] The Key Which Would Have Saved Titanic ‎
item.description: A KEY to the doomed Titanic’s binocular box was not handed to the replacement officer. As a result, officers had no access to binoculars on the bridge or in the crow’s nest – and 1,517 people perished when the ship hit an iceberg on April 15, 1912. The key is expected to sell for at least £70,000 at auction today.

item.title: [+633] Gameshow Pedophile
item.description: The guy is soo creepy! I can't believe this went on the air and nobody said a word..Very weird times those 70's and 80's.
